title: vishAlAkSi nAyakan
sahitya:
vishAlAkSi nAyakan aravindap-padam paNi nenjamE


anupallavi

 gajAnananoDu guhanai InRa karuNaiyam kaDal tanai ulagelAm
ishai paravu kAshi nagar ezhundaruL annapUraNi ennum annai


caraNam 1    pAsha valaiyil shikki shuzhalil panju pOl nonduzhala vaittAi
Ishanaiyum maranda maDa nenjE enakkum sukhamillai unakkum sukhamillai
  caraNam 2    mOsham pOnadu pOdumE mummUrttigaLuL mudal mUrttiyai
vishvEshvaranai iraivA abhayamenru viraindu malaraDi paNindu nil shrI
